property.name: emulator.io.log.location
property.description: The I/O Log location. It’s the output location for extractor and input location for cleaner.

property.name: emulator.merge.keyword
property.description: The keyword for date merge, it is used in cleaner and flusher. Available options are ‘timesequence’ and ‘filename’

property.name: emulator.opr.filter
property.description: Operation type(s) that can pass operation type filter. If more than two type, delimits them by ‘,’. Available options are IRP, FSF, NIO.

property.name: emulator.irp.filter
property.description: Irp flag that can pass irp flag filter. If more than two type, delimits them by ‘,’. Available options are all, c, p, s, y

property.name: emulator.majorop.filter
property.description: Major operation that can pass major operation filter. Only read, write is available.

property.name: emulator.status.filter
property.description: Operation status that can pass status filter. Available options are success, error and waring.

property.name: emulator.keyword.filter
property.description: Operation contains the specified keyword can pass the keyword filter.

property.name: emulator.buffer.size
property.description: The number of records will be stored in flusher before being flushed.

property.name: emulator.fake.file.location
property.description: The fake file location, it is the output location for generator.
